name: stattablediff
description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

inputs.name: Input Table 1
inputs.description: Input table 1 (output of asegstats2table or aparcstats2table)

inputs.name: Input Table 2
inputs.description: Input table 2 (output of asegstats2table or aparcstats2table)

inputs.name: Output File
inputs.description: Output file for the table of differences

inputs.name: Percent Difference
inputs.description: Compute percent difference with respect to mean of tables

inputs.name: Percent Difference Table 1
inputs.description: Compute percent difference with respect to table 1

inputs.name: Percent Difference Table 2
inputs.description: Compute percent difference with respect to table 2

inputs.name: Common Segments
inputs.description: Compute difference on common segments (may reorder)

inputs.name: Remove Exvivo
inputs.description: Remove the string '_exvivo' from the column header

inputs.name: No Replace 5.3 Names
inputs.description: Do not replace 5.3 structure names with later names

author: FreeSurfer Developers
